name: Last Pixel Standing
description:
This is a small game about one guy who woke up and finds himself in a dungeon full of monsters.

He has no weapons but fortunately the dungeon is full of traps and items.
Your goal is to kill the monsters using the environment of the dungeon...

To do this, the following traps / item are available:

- Spears (floor - trap)
- Flamethrower (floor/air - trap)
- Trap door (floor -trap) -> Needs at least two enemies to trigger
- Dynamite (floor/air - item)
- Bear trap (floor - item)

Good luck!

P.s.: Difficulty affects the amount of lifes you have and the speed of the enemies.

Write in the comments if you have beaten the game on "Nightmare". :)
Of course, any helpful comment is welcome.

Beta information:

  • Map balancing not fully done yet
  • Bugs might occure

This is my very first game and I hope you can enjoy it playing.
